list.en: What's your plan?
list.cn: 你的计划是什么?

list.en: Will you go there alone or with a friend?
list.cn: 你一个人去还是和朋友一起去?

list.en: How long is your vacation?
list.cn: 你的假期有多长?

list.en: When will you leave?
list.cn: 你什么时候走?

list.en: Where are you heading for?
list.cn: 你要去哪里?

list.en: How long are you going for?
list.cn: 你要去多久?

list.en: Where are you going for your trip?
list.cn: 你打算去哪里旅行?

list.en: Planning to go traveling in july.
list.cn: 计划七月份去旅游。

list.en: Did we prepare all the belongings?
list.cn: 我们准备好所有的东西了吗?

list.en: What kind of tours do you have?
list.cn: 你们有哪些旅游线路?

list.en: How much is your travel budget?
list.cn: 你的旅行预算是多少?

list.en: What's the fare of a one day tour?
list.cn: 一日游的费用是多少?

list.en: I'm planning to visit London.
list.cn: 我计划去伦敦旅游。

list.en: I would like your advice about our traveling plan.
list.cn: 我想听听你对我们的旅行计划的建议。

list.en: I'm supposed to go on a vacation with my family later this year.
list.cn: 今年晚些时候我打算和家人去度假。

list.en: I want to have an independent traveling.
list.cn: 我想独立旅行。

list.en: What should we take for the trip?
list.cn: 我们应该带什么去旅行?

list.en: Do we start packing our bags?
list.cn: 我们开始收拾行李了吗?

list.en: Have you packed?
list.cn: 你打包了吗?

list.en: May I put something in your bag?
list.cn: 我可以在你的包里放些东西吗?

list.en: Why not take some medicine?
list.cn: 为什么不吃点药呢?

list.en: How many clothes should we take?
list.cn: 我们应该带多少件衣服?

list.en: What about the sun blocking cream?
list.cn: 防晒霜怎么样?

list.en: Our plans for the trip are all set.
list.cn: 我们的旅行计划都定好了。

list.en: Your trip will be easy if without too many belongings.
list.cn: 如果没有太多的行李，你的旅行会很容易。

list.en: Take the things that are really useful during the tour.
list.cn: 带上旅行中真正有用的东西。

list.en: We are getting things together in preparation for the journey.
list.cn: 我们正在收拾东西为旅行做准备。

list.en: It doesn't make sense that taking too much things with you.
list.cn: 随身带太多东西是没有意义的。

list.en: There was not so much space left in my baggage case.
list.cn: 我的手提箱里没有多少空间了。

list.en: Everything is in order.
list.cn: 一切都井然有序。

list.en: You should buy a bigger luggage.
list.cn: 你应该买个大一点的行李。

list.en: You better bring an umbrella.
list.cn: 你最好带把伞。

list.en: Do you have any baggage to check?
list.cn: 您有行李要托运吗?

list.en: What are the check in procedures for luggage?
list.cn: 行李托运手续是怎样的?

list.en: May I carry my little dog?
list.cn: 我可以带我的小狗吗?

list.en: Would you please put on the baggage label?
list.cn: 请系上行李标签好吗?

list.en: Check it in to my final destination.
list.cn: 把它托运到我的目的地。

list.en: These are your baggage checks.
list.cn: 这是您的行李托运单。

list.en: You are permitted to carry on items.
list.cn: 你可以随身携带物品。

list.en: I have a baggage to check in.
list.cn: 我有件行李要托运。

list.en: You'll have to check that item of luggage.
list.cn: 那件行李你得托运。

list.en: You have to pay excess baggage charges.
list.cn: 您得付行李超重费。

list.en: Here are the tags for your traveling bags.
list.cn: 这是您的旅行袋的标签。

list.en: Do you have any suggestions for the coming vacation?
list.cn: 你对即将到来的假期有什么建议吗?

list.en: How will you spend your vacation?
list.cn: 你打算怎么度过你的假期?

list.en: What about going to a first class cruise ship to Australia this vacation?
list.cn: 这个假期坐头等舱游船去澳大利亚怎么样?

list.en: I'll spend my vacation in the mountains.
list.cn: 我将在山上度假。

list.en: I'm going to the United States for the vacation.
list.cn: 我要去美国度假。

list.en: I want to go on a vacation abroad.
list.cn: 我想去国外度假。

list.en: It's wonderful to go on a vacation in this season.
list.cn: 在这个季节去度假真是太好了。

list.en: You should not Miss the louvre museum.
list.cn: 你不应该错过卢浮宫博物馆。

list.en: You should not Miss the louvre museum.
list.cn: 你不应该错过卢浮宫博物馆。

list.en: It's really a tourist attraction.
list.cn: 它确实是一个旅游景点。

list.en: I'm going on a journey to Hawaii.
list.cn: 我要去夏威夷旅行。

list.en: Have you ever been to Paris before?
list.cn: 你以前去过巴黎吗?

list.en: Why not go to Bali?
list.cn: 为什么不去巴厘岛呢?

list.en: Have a nice trip.
list.cn: 祝你旅途愉快。

list.en: What day would you like to leave?
list.cn: 您想哪一天离开?

list.en: I'd like a one way ticket to new York.
list.cn: 我要一张去纽约的单程票。

list.en: Is there a flight that leaves later?
list.cn: 有晚一点起飞的航班吗?

list.en: What's your return date?
list.cn: 你什么时候回来?

list.en: Please reserve four seats.
list.cn: 请预订四个座位。

list.en: I would like to pay by credit card.
list.cn: 我想用信用卡支付。

list.en: Could I get a later flight?
list.cn: 我可以乘坐晚一点的航班吗?

list.en: I would like to make a reservation.
list.cn: 我想预订房间。

list.en: How long does the flight take?
list.cn: 飞行要多长时间?

list.en: That'll be eighteen hundred dollars for two tickets.
list.cn: 两张票是1800美元。

list.en: Where would you like to go?
list.cn: 你想去哪里?

list.en: Could you tell me the traveling rates?
list.cn: 你能告诉我旅行费用吗?

list.en: Could you arrange a trip for me?
list.cn: 你能为我安排一次旅行吗?

list.en: How much is the tour?
list.cn: 这趟旅行要多少钱?

list.en: Which tour do you recommend?
list.cn: 你推荐哪条线路?

list.en: We can be away for just a month for this trip.
list.cn: 这次旅行我们可以只离开一个月。

list.en: What does it include?
list.cn: 它包括什么?

list.en: I'll call you back to make the reservation.
list.cn: 我会给您回电话预约的。

list.en: How much does this tour cost?
list.cn: 这趟旅行要花多少钱?

list.en: Could you make the plane, hotel and tour reservations?
list.cn: 你能预订飞机、旅馆和旅游吗?

list.en: It's a whole day tour.
list.cn: 这是一整天的旅行。

list.en: I have enough time for shopping and sightseeing.
list.cn: 我有足够的时间购物和观光。

list.en: I'd like to reserve the package tours.
list.cn: 我想预订旅行团。

list.en: Where can I apply for a passport?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以申请护照?

list.en: How long will it take to apply for a passport?
list.cn: 申请护照需要多长时间?

list.en: When can I get my passport?
list.cn: 我什么时候能拿到护照?

list.en: What must I offer for applying for the traveling passport?
list.cn: 申请旅行护照我必须提供什么?

list.en: Have you applied for a Visa before?
list.cn: 你以前申请过签证吗?

list.en: What type of Visa are you applying for?
list.cn: 你申请的是哪一种签证?

list.en: Do you mind if I ask you a few questions?
list.cn: 你介意我问你几个问题吗?

list.en: When do you plan to leave?
list.cn: 你打算什么时候走?

list.en: What are you going to Germany for?
list.cn: 你去德国干什么?

list.en: I'd like to apply for a traveling passport.
list.cn: 我想申请旅行护照。

list.en: I come to inquire how to apply for a travelling Visa.
list.cn: 我来询问如何申请旅游签证。

list.en: I'm here to have the Visa interview.
list.cn: 我是来做签证面试的。

list.en: Here are my documents.
list.cn: 这是我的文件。

list.en: Have you got anything to declare?
list.cn: 你有什么要申报的吗?

list.en: May I give you an oral declaration?
list.cn: 我可以向你口头申报吗?

list.en: Do I have to open all of my packages?
list.cn: 我必须打开所有的包裹吗?

list.en: Are these things duty free?
list.cn: 这些东西免税吗?

list.en: Here is my passport.
list.cn: 这是我的护照。

list.en: Passport, please.
list.cn: 护照,请。

list.en: May I have a look at your passport and Visa?
list.cn: 我可以看一下您的护照和签证吗?

list.en: Fill in this form, please.
list.cn: 请填一下这张表。

list.en: I don't have anything to declare.
list.cn: 我没有要申报的东西。

list.en: Would you mind opening the suitcase, please?
list.cn: 请您打开手提箱好吗?

list.en: I have some perfume just for myself.
list.cn: 我为自己准备了一些香水。

list.en: I've paid the duty.
list.cn: 我已经付了税。

list.en: These are all personal belongings.
list.cn: 这些都是私人物品。

list.en: How could I get to the gate ten?
list.cn: 我怎么才能到十号登机门?

list.en: How can I get to the gate sixteen from here?
list.cn: 从这里怎么去16号登机门?

list.en: The plane is about to take off at half past eleven.
list.cn: 飞机将在十一点半起飞。

list.en: Where can we board the plane?
list.cn: 我们在哪里登机?

list.en: Which gate should we board the plane?
list.cn: 我们应该在哪个门登机?

list.en: What is the gate number of flight number 33 to London?
list.cn: 去伦敦的33次航班的登机门是几号?

list.en: I have to board the flight number fifteen before eight thirty.
list.cn: 我必须在8点半之前登上15号班机。

list.en: We should board the plane at gate sixteen.
list.cn: 我们应该在16号登机门登机。

list.en: We should reach the gate as soon as possible.
list.cn: 我们应该尽快到达大门口。

list.en: The flight number sixteen will begin boarding at eight at gate nine.
list.cn: 16次航班将于8点在9号门开始登机。

list.en: Is this camera a gift for someone?
list.cn: 这台相机是送人的礼物吗?

list.en: What should I take when I am boarding?
list.cn: 登机时我应该带什么?

list.en: Your luggage can weigh up to thirty kilos.
list.cn: 你的行李重可达30公斤。

list.en: Can I have a look at your passport?
list.cn: 我能看一下你的护照吗?

list.en: May I see your boarding pass?
list.cn: 我可以看一下您的登机牌吗?

list.en: How much luggage can one take on the plane?
list.cn: 一个人可以带多少行李上飞机?

list.en: Would you please fill in this form?
list.cn: 请您填一下这张表好吗?

list.en: Can I take this as a carry on?
list.cn: 这个我可以随身携带吗?

list.en: What gate number do I go to?
list.cn: 我该在几号登机门登机?

list.en: Do I have to write down all the things I have to declare?
list.cn: 我必须把所有要申报的东西都写下来吗?

list.en: How should we go through the security check?
list.cn: 我们应该怎样通过安全检查呢?

list.en: Please line up in order and cooperate with us to have a check.
list.cn: 请按顺序排队，配合我们进行检查。

list.en: Anyone who refuses that.
list.cn: 任何拒绝的人。

list.en: Anyone who refuses that will not be allowed to board the flight.
list.cn: 任何拒绝登机的人都将被禁止登机。

list.en: Please put burnable materials into this tray.
list.cn: 请把可燃材料放在这个托盘里。

list.en: If you don't have forbidden articles, it will be very quick.
list.cn: 如果你没有违禁物品，会很快的。

list.en: Take out all articles in your pockets, such as cigarettes, keys, lighters, calculators, cell phones, then put them in the basket.
list.cn: 拿出口袋里所有的东西，比如香烟、钥匙、打火机、计算器、手机，然后把它们放进篮子里。

list.en: How long will the search take?
list.cn: 搜索需要多长时间?

list.en: Thanks for your cooperation.
list.cn: 谢谢你的合作。

list.en: Please cooperate with us in checking.
list.cn: 请配合我们检查。

list.en: Please put your baggage on the belt.
list.cn: 请把行李放在传送带上。

list.en: The alarm still rings. Please check it again.
list.cn: 闹钟还在响。请再检查一遍。

list.en: When will the flight leave?
list.cn: 飞机什么时候起飞?

list.en: Will the plane take off on time?
list.cn: 飞机会准时起飞吗?

list.en: The plane has been delayed for one day.
list.cn: 飞机晚点了一天。

list.en: Will the plane take off at seven o'clock?
list.cn: 飞机七点起飞吗?

list.en: How long will the flight be delayed?
list.cn: 班机延误多长时间?

list.en: Show me your boarding card, please.
list.cn: 请出示您的登机牌。

list.en: When should I check in?
list.cn: 我应该什么时候办理登机手续?

list.en: Boarding time has been delayed three hours.
list.cn: 登机时间推迟了三个小时。

list.en: Could you show me where is the information desk?
list.cn: 你能告诉我问讯处在哪里吗?

list.en: Flight 36 will be delayed because of the heavy fog.
list.cn: 由于大雾，36次航班将延误。

list.en: I'm so afraid of flying.
list.cn: 我很害怕坐飞机。

list.en: Will this flight get there on time?
list.cn: 这班机会准时到达吗?

list.en: Anything to drink.
list.cn: 喝点什么都行。

list.en: What kind of drinks do you have?
list.cn: 你们有哪些饮料?

list.en: Excuse me, the overhead locker is full.
list.cn: 对不起，头顶的储物柜已经满了。

list.en: I don't know how to adjust my seat.
list.cn: 我不知道怎么调整我的座位。

list.en: May I change a seat?
list.cn: 我可以换座位吗?

list.en: A bit.
list.cn: 一点。

list.en: A blanket, please.
list.cn: 请给我一条毯子。

list.en: Excuse me, where is c 25 a.
list.cn: 对不起，请问c25a在哪里?

list.en: This headset doesn't work. Could you replace it please?
list.cn: 这个耳机坏了。请你换一个好吗?

list.en: May I take this seat?
list.cn: 我可以坐这个座位吗?

list.en: Would you mind changing seats with me?
list.cn: 你介意和我换座位吗?

list.en: Would you mind switching seats with me?
list.cn: 你介意和我换一下座位吗?

list.en: Do you have any vacant seats together somewhere?
list.cn: 你们有空位吗?

list.en: My wife and I were assigned separate seats.
list.cn: 我和妻子被分配了不同的座位。

list.en: Our positions have been reversed.
list.cn: 我们的立场颠倒了。

list.en: Do you mind changing your seat with me?
list.cn: 你介意和我换一下座位吗?

list.en: May I move to the nonsmoking area for a while?
list.cn: 我可以搬到禁烟区住一会儿吗?

list.en: I wonder if I could change my seat to the front part.
list.cn: 我可不可以把我的座位换到前面去。

list.en: The seat number is sixteen a but there is somebody sitting there.
list.cn: 座位号是16a，但是有人坐在那里。

list.en: Where can I get information on connecting flight?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以得到转机的信息?

list.en: After you get your luggage, you should go downstairs to the domestic transfer.
list.cn: 拿到行李后，您应该下楼到国内转机站。

list.en: If still confused, there is an information center on the.
list.cn: 如果还是不明白，有信息中心就可以了。

list.en: If still confused, there is an information center on the first floor.
list.cn: 如果还是不明白，可以去一楼的问讯处。

list.en: I need to get there as soon as possible.
list.cn: 我要尽快赶到那里。

list.en: We're terribly sorry for the.
list.cn: 我们非常抱歉。

list.en: We're terribly sorry for the inconvenience.
list.cn: 对于给您带来的不便，我们深表歉意。

list.en: Transit passengers should not go through customs or immigration.
list.cn: 过境旅客不应通过海关或入境检查。

list.en: My flight was delayed so I couldn't get to my connecting flight on time.
list.cn: 我的航班延误了，所以我没能准时赶上转机航班。

list.en: Please have a complimentary dinner at the airport restaurant.
list.cn: 请在机场餐厅享用免费晚餐。

list.en: I didn't arrive in time to make my connecting flight.
list.cn: 我没能及时赶上转机航班。

list.en: Passengers who were traveling to Chicago should go to gate thirteen.
list.cn: 去芝加哥的旅客应到13号门登机。

list.en: If you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask any member of our staff for help.
list.cn: 如果您有任何问题，请不要犹豫，向我们的工作人员寻求帮助。

list.en: We will see you when we get back.
list.cn: 我们回来后再见。

list.en: I will Miss you too.
list.cn: 我也会想你的。

list.en: I will Miss you.
list.cn: 我会想念你的。

list.en: What gate should I Miss you at?
list.cn: 我该在哪个登机口等你?

list.en: Thanks for picking us up.
list.cn: 谢谢你来接我们。

list.en: What time will you be arriving?
list.cn: 你什么时候到?

list.en: I wish I could go with you.
list.cn: 我希望我能和你一起去。

list.en: I can't wait until you come back.
list.cn: 我等不及你回来了。

list.en: I wish you could join us.
list.cn: 我希望你能加入我们。

list.en: Have a great trip.
list.cn: 祝你旅途愉快。

list.en: You shouldn't have come all the way out here.
list.cn: 你不该大老远跑到这儿来。

list.en: We're all for sun, sand and shells.
list.cn: 我们都喜欢阳光、沙滩和贝壳。

list.en: Can you get me a beach umbrella?
list.cn: 你能给我一把沙滩伞吗?

list.en: Have you surfed before?
list.cn: 你以前冲浪过吗?

list.en: I saw many footprints in the sand.
list.cn: 我在沙滩上看到许多脚印。

list.en: Is this swimming for rent?
list.cn: 这个游泳池是出租的吗?

list.en: Do you have sun mats here?
list.cn: 你们这儿有太阳垫吗?

list.en: Can I rent a board here?
list.cn: 我可以在这里租一个板子吗?

list.en: The sand beaches in New Zealand are very clean.
list.cn: 新西兰的沙滩非常干净。

list.en: Is this disc?
list.cn: 这是光盘吗?

list.en: Is this desk chair available?
list.cn: 这张桌椅有人用吗?

list.en: We lay on the beach, saturated in sunshine.
list.cn: 我们躺在沙滩上，沐浴在阳光下。

list.en: I'd like to take a sunbath.
list.cn: 我想做个日光浴。

list.en: I love European pearls.
list.cn: 我喜欢欧洲的珍珠。

list.en: I love European parks.
list.cn: 我喜欢欧洲的公园。

list.en: Mozart memorial is near here, right?
list.cn: 莫扎特纪念馆就在附近，对吧?

list.en: I suggest you go to the louvre museum first.
list.cn: 我建议你先去卢浮宫。

list.en: Greenwich park is lovely and the observatory is really interesting.
list.cn: 格林威治公园很可爱，天文台也很有趣。

list.en: We must be approaching the heart of the city now.
list.cn: 我们现在一定快到市中心了。

list.en: Now we are just coming up to London bridge.
list.cn: 现在我们就要到伦敦桥了。

list.en: Venice is considered as one of the most beautiful cities in the world.
list.cn: 威尼斯被认为是世界上最美丽的城市之一。

list.en: London is one of the financial centers in the world.
list.cn: 伦敦是世界金融中心之一。

list.en: What do you think has impressed you most in London?
list.cn: 你认为伦敦给你印象最深的是什么?

list.en: Venice is one of Europe's leading tourist spots.
list.cn: 威尼斯是欧洲主要的旅游景点之一。

list.en: It's not far from here to the Thames.
list.cn: 从这里到泰晤士河不远。

list.en: What if we go to see buckingham palace first?
list.cn: 我们先去看看白金汉宫怎么样?

list.en: We are getting near to the arch of triumph.
list.cn: 我们正在接近凯旋门。

list.en: Where is the nearest train station?
list.cn: 最近的火车站在哪里?

list.en: Where is the post office?
list.cn: 邮局在哪里?

list.en: Is there a grocery nearby?
list.cn: 附近有杂货店吗?

list.en: How do I get to the airport?
list.cn: 我怎么去机场?

list.en: Could you show me on the map?
list.cn: 你能在地图上指给我看吗?

list.en: Is this the road to Dallas?
list.cn: 这是去达拉斯的路吗?

list.en: Is it far from here?
list.cn: 离这儿远吗?

list.en: It's on your left.
list.cn: 它在你的左边。

list.en: It's two miles down the highway.
list.cn: 沿着高速公路走两英里。

list.en: Turn right at the next corner.
list.cn: 在下一个路口右转。

list.en: Is there a hospital nearby?
list.cn: 附近有医院吗?

list.en: Is there a public toilet nearby?
list.cn: 请问附近有公共厕所吗?

list.en: Is there a restaurant nearby?
list.cn: 请问附近有餐厅吗?

list.en: How do I get to the train station?
list.cn: 去火车站怎么走?

list.en: Press the button.
list.cn: 按下按钮。

list.en: It's a good picture.
list.cn: 这是一张好照片。

list.en: I took a lot of pictures.
list.cn: 我拍了很多照片。

list.en: Take a picture of that.
list.cn: 拍张照片。

list.en: Where was this picture taken?
list.cn: 这张照片是在哪里拍的?

list.en: Would you take a picture of us?
list.cn: 你能帮我们照张相吗?

list.en: Are we allowed to take pictures here?
list.cn: 我们可以在这里拍照吗?

list.en: I just got a new camera for the vacation.
list.cn: 我刚买了一台度假用的新相机。

list.en: I'll take the picture of this landscape.
list.cn: 我要拍下这风景的照片。

list.en: The pictures came out very well.
list.cn: 这些照片拍得很好。

list.en: Where can I get my pictures?
list.cn: 我在哪里可以得到我的照片?

list.en: Where did you take these photos?
list.cn: 你在哪里拍的这些照片?

list.en: The scenery in the picture is very nice. I don't want to have these pictures printed.
list.cn: 这幅画中的风景很好。我不想把这些照片印出来。

list.en: Color prints are more beautiful.
list.cn: 彩色印刷品更漂亮。

list.en: I'd like to have my photos in the u disk developed.
list.cn: 我想把u盘里的照片洗一下。

list.en: I want these photos to be double prints.
list.cn: 我希望这些照片是双印的。

list.en: How long will it take to develop these photos?
list.cn: 冲洗这些照片需要多长时间?

list.en: Please take your pictures tomorrow morning.
list.cn: 请明天早上拍照。

list.en: Your photos are ready.
list.cn: 你的照片准备好了。

list.en: You are very photogenic.
list.cn: 你很上镜。

list.en: I'd like to develop them into black and white photos.
list.cn: 我想把它们冲洗成黑白照片。

list.en: Could you please tell me where I can buy some souvenirs?
list.cn: 你能告诉我在哪里可以买到纪念品吗?

list.en: I'd like to buy some souvenirs. Can you give me some suggestions?
list.cn: 我想买些纪念品。你能给我一些建议吗?

list.en: I'd like to buy some souvenirs for my friends.
list.cn: 我想给我的朋友买些纪念品。

list.en: Are they specialties of China?
list.cn: 它们是中国特产吗?

list.en: You can buy some souvenirs there.
list.cn: 你可以在那里买到一些纪念品。

list.en: I bought a few trifles as souvenirs.
list.cn: 我买了一些小东西作为纪念品。

list.en: There are many souvenir shops nearby.
list.cn: 附近有许多纪念品商店。

list.en: We d like to buy some souvenirs to Mark this pleasant journey.
list.cn: 我们想买些纪念品纪念这次愉快的旅行。

list.en: I'm looking for a gift for my friends.
list.cn: 我在给我的朋友挑礼物。

list.en: Please wrap this for me.
list.cn: 请帮我把这个包起来。

list.en: I need to make an international call.
list.cn: 我要打一个国际电话。

list.en: How do I dial out?
list.cn: 我怎么拨出去?

list.en: How do I make an international call?
list.cn: 我怎样打国际电话?

list.en: I would like to make a collect call to Paris.
list.cn: 我想打对方付费电话到巴黎。

list.en: What do I dial after the access code?
list.cn: 输入接入码后我要拨什么?

list.en: Could you please try getting through to this number for me?
list.cn: 你能帮我试着接通这个号码吗?

list.en: What are your rates for overseas calls?
list.cn: 你们的国际长途电话费是多少?

list.en: What's the country code?
list.cn: 国家代码是多少?

list.en: Could you put a call through to America for me?
list.cn: 你能帮我打个电话到美国吗?

list.en: The trip was a lot of fun.
list.cn: 这次旅行很有趣。

list.en: It's so nice to be home.
list.cn: 回家的感觉真好。

list.en: Was it a good trip? I am going to upload the pictures right away.
list.cn: 旅途愉快吗?我马上上传照片。

list.en: I am so tired from the trip.
list.cn: 这次旅行让我很累。

list.en: Did you have a good journey?
list.cn: 你旅途愉快吗?

list.en: What a nice trip.
list.cn: 多么愉快的旅行啊。

list.en: We're really over tired.
list.cn: 我们真的太累了。

list.en: It kind of sucks that our vacation is over, though.
list.cn: 不过我们的假期结束了，感觉有点糟。

list.en: I am going to call my friends and tell them how the trip went.
list.cn: 我要打电话给我的朋友，告诉他们这次旅行怎么样。
